languages.text: Под климакуполами, сокрытые облаками яда, были выстроены охраняемые роскошные дворцы. Они приняли стольких влиятельных негодяев, преследуемых аристократов и богатых мерзавцев, что Веабос-6 обрел немыслимое политическое влияние. Столь масштабные и зловещие дела творились на нем, что вскоре о мрачном мире смерти заговорили как о новом политическом центре Простора.

Guarded luxurious palaces were built under the climate domes, shrouded by clouds of poison. They housed so many powerful blackguards, persecuted aristocrats, and wealthy scoundrels that Vheabos VI gained unimaginable political influence. Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Под климакуполами, сокрытые облаками яда, были выстроены охраняемые роскошные дворцы. Они приняли стольких влиятельных негодяев, преследуемых аристократов и богатых мерзавцев, что Веабос-6 обрел немыслимое политическое влияние. Such vast and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

They housed so many powerful blackguards, persecuted aristocrats, and wealthy scoundrels that Vheabos VI gained unimaginable political influence. Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

languages.text: 维博斯六号星的殖民温室之中建起了无数奢华的宫殿，由卫兵日夜把守，毒雾也被挡在了外面。这颗行星收押了无数权倾朝野的恶棍、遭到迫害的贵族、以及富可敌国的商人，获得了难以想象的政治影响力。无数人在这里谋划着伟大而邪恶的阴谋。没过多久，这个严酷的死亡世界就变成了科罗努斯扩区新的政治中心。
languages.original_text: Guarded luxurious palaces were built under the climate domes, shrouded by clouds of poison. They housed so many powerful blackguards, persecuted aristocrats, and wealthy scoundrels that Vheabos VI gained unimaginable political influence. Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 维博斯六号星的殖民温室之中建起了无数奢华的宫殿，由卫兵日夜把守，毒雾也被挡在了外面。这颗行星收押了无数权倾朝野的恶棍、遭到迫害的贵族、以及富可敌国的商人，获得了难以想象的政治影响力。无数人在这里谋划着伟大而邪恶的阴谋。没过多久，这个严酷的死亡世界就变成了科罗努斯扩区新的政治中心。

languages.text: 毒の雲に覆われた気候ドームの下に、警備の厳重な豪華な宮殿が建てられていた。彼らは多くの屈強な悪漢、迫害された貴族、裕福なならず者たちを収容し、ヴィアボス・VIは想像を絶する政治的影響力を獲得した。そこでは壮大かつ邪悪な行為が行われており、やがてこの過酷な死地惑星は、エクスパンスの新たな政治の中心地として語られるようになった。
languages.original_text: Guarded luxurious palaces were built under the climate domes, shrouded by clouds of poison. They housed so many powerful blackguards, persecuted aristocrats, and wealthy scoundrels that Vheabos VI gained unimaginable political influence. Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 毒の雲に覆われた気候ドームの下に、警備の厳重な豪華な宮殿が建てられていた。彼らは多くの屈強な悪漢、迫害された貴族、裕福なならず者たちを収容し、ヴィアボス・VIは想像を絶する政治的影響力を獲得した。そこでは壮大かつ邪悪な行為が行われており、やがてこの過酷な死地惑星は、エクスパンスの新たな政治の中心地として語られるようになった。

languages.text: De luxueux palais gardés furent bâtis sous les dômes climatiques, entourés de nuages toxiques. Ils hébergeaient tant de puissants gardes noirs, d'aristocrates persécutés et de riches bandits que Vhéabos-VI acquit une influence politique inimaginable. Des actes si sinistres et grandioses y furent accomplis que le monde hostile et sombre fut rapidement considéré comme le nouveau centre politique des Étendues.
languages.original_text: Guarded luxurious palaces were built under the climate domes, shrouded by clouds of poison. They housed so many powerful blackguards, persecuted aristocrats, and wealthy scoundrels that Vheabos VI gained unimaginable political influence. Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: De luxueux palais gardés furent bâtis sous les dômes climatiques, entourés de nuages toxiques. Ils hébergeaient tant de puissants gardes noirs, d'aristocrates persécutés et de riches bandits que Vhéabos-VI acquit une influence politique inimaginable. Des actes si sinistres et grandioses y furent accomplis que le monde hostile et sombre fut rapidement considéré comme le nouveau centre politique des Étendues.

languages.text: Se construyeron palacios lujosos en cúpulas climatizadas entre las nubes de veneno. Alojaban a tantos delincuentes poderosos, aristócratas fugados y criminales ricos que Vheabos VI obtuvo una influencia política inmensa. Se realizaron actos tan grandiosos y siniestros allí que el mundo letal no tardó en considerarse el nuevo centro político de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: Guarded luxurious palaces were built under the climate domes, shrouded by clouds of poison. They housed so many powerful blackguards, persecuted aristocrats, and wealthy scoundrels that Vheabos VI gained unimaginable political influence. Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Se construyeron palacios lujosos en cúpulas climatizadas entre las nubes de veneno. Alojaban a tantos delincuentes poderosos, aristócratas fugados y criminales ricos que Vheabos VI obtuvo una influencia política inmensa. Se realizaron actos tan grandiosos y siniestros allí que el mundo letal no tardó en considerarse el nuevo centro político de la Extensión.

languages.text: Bewachte Luxuspaläste wurden unter den Klimakuppeln errichtet, umgeben von Giftwolken. Darin lebten so viele mächtige Black Guards, verfolgte Aristokraten und wohlhabende Schurken, dass Vheabos VI unvorstellbaren politischen Einfluss erlangte. Es ereigneten sich Taten so umfassend und hinterhältig, dass die düstere Todeswelt schon bald als neues politisches Zentrum der Ausdehnung galt.
languages.original_text: Guarded luxurious palaces were built under the climate domes, shrouded by clouds of poison. They housed so many powerful blackguards, persecuted aristocrats, and wealthy scoundrels that Vheabos VI gained unimaginable political influence. Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Bewachte Luxuspaläste wurden unter den Klimakuppeln errichtet, umgeben von Giftwolken. Darin lebten so viele mächtige Black Guards, verfolgte Aristokraten und wohlhabende Schurken, dass Vheabos VI unvorstellbaren politischen Einfluss erlangte. Es ereigneten sich Taten so umfassend und hinterhältig, dass die düstere Todeswelt schon bald als neues politisches Zentrum der Ausdehnung galt.

languages.text: Zehirli bulutlarla çevrili iklim kubbelerinin altına korunaklı, lüks saraylar inşa edildi. O kadar çok güç sahibi haine, işkenceye uğramış aristokrata ve zengin alçağa ev sahipliği yapıyorlardı ki Vheabos VI, hayal bile edilemeyecek bir politik nüfuza sahip oldu. Gezegende büyük çaplı ve uğursuz eylemlerin gerçekleştirilmesiyle bu çirkin ölüm dünyası, çok geçmeden Enginlik'in yeni politik merkezi olarak görülür oldu.
languages.original_text: Guarded luxurious palaces were built under the climate domes, shrouded by clouds of poison. They housed so many powerful blackguards, persecuted aristocrats, and wealthy scoundrels that Vheabos VI gained unimaginable political influence. Such grand and sinister deeds were done there that before long the grim death world was spoken of as the new political centre of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Zehirli bulutlarla çevrili iklim kubbelerinin altına, korunaklı, lüks saraylar inşa edildi. O kadar çok güç sahibi haine, işkenceye uğramış aristokrata ve zengin alçağa ev sahipliği yapıyorlardı ki, Vheabos VI hayal bile edilemeyecek bir politik nüfuza sahip oldu. Orada o kadar çok büyük çaplı ve uğursuz eylem gerçekleştirildi ki, çok geçmeden çirkin ölüm dünyasının, Enginlik'in yeni politik merkezi hâline geldiği konuşulmaya başlandı.
